name: digdig.io
description:
It's time to own the world with Digdig.io! Are you ready to navigate an environment full of obstacles and dangerous opponents as you try to grow by collecting water and avoid dying from the incandescent lava that hides at every turn?

Observe your surroundings very carefully and think quickly in which direction to move to avoid being devoured by enemies bigger than you. Only if your opponents are smaller will they become easy prey for you. Be brave as you climb to the top of the leaderboard and have a blast!
